name: Sticker Doodle Sticker
summary: Learn about .STKDOODLZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Sticker Doodle is a sticker creation app available for iOS. It allows you to import a photo or hand-draw an image, add a border or background, and turn the resulting image into a sticker. Primarily, Sticker Doodle stickers are meant to be used with iMessage. However, the app also lets you export stickers for use with WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, and Discord.

If you want to share a Sticker Doodle sticker with another user, you can export the sticker as a STKDOODLZ file. To do so, press and hold on a sticker in Sticker Doodle, and then select Share. This will allow you to send the sticker to others as a STKDOODLZ file.

description: A STKDOODLZ file is a sticker created by Sticker Doodle, an app used to create iMessage, WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, and Discord stickers. It is a .ZIP archive that contains a .PNG sticker image and associated .DAT files. STKDOODLZ files can be created from photos or drawings.

instructions: You can open a STKDOODLZ file with Sticker Doodle (iOS). To do so, open the file in Quick Look, select the Share button, and then open the file with Sticker Doodle.
